d_unload_alert: You have {booksNb} pending session(s). Please remain at this page and close it(them) or logout before leaving page
d_ongoingdialog_alert: There is an ongoing dialog between server and client. Please repeat the operation later
d_ackterm_nok_alert: There is a session requiring user intervention. Please repeat the operation later
d_userunload_msg: Some opened sessions can't be properly closed. Do you still want to proceed ?
d_timeout_msg: Your convergence session(s) is(are) about to expire. Would you like to maintain it(them) ? Click 'No' to close them
d_timeout_info: Your convergence sessions have been closed because of timeout
